channel.title: ~~update code for shops to add what they say?~~
channel.description:
if any of u have a textcode such as ::update23 to add items to shops but i need shop code to change what they say just as ( pure shop here! ) i need to change it.
also if u know how to get compile to work plz tell me and i can tell u something as well!
my server need's a coder and co owner and object adder an editor!
--coder-- - add codes - fix problems - add specs and more - even item codes
--co owner-- - ban ppl - advertise - kick ppl - help out with server
--object add-- - adds objects - fix problems and more
--editor-- none atm
ty ownd

item.title: ~~update code for shops to add what they say?~~
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Ok, enter Npchandler or NPC its been a while since i last used this.
Press ctrl + F and find the text that the npc says. Then just change it.
After save the document and click “compile”

Read full topic
